name: Tall Tales Demo
description: You are a boy named, Ian. Living day to day in a humdrum town with no way for adventure outside of a few pages. That is until a stranger appears to guide you towards the truth of your beginnings.  The world of Aleria has been infested with, "the Core." Beings that have been corrupted by the planet's power.  It's up to you and your friends to help bring peace to your world!  ...Or is there more to it than it seems?
